description: Based on the user query identify the API to call.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: User query used to understand the ask.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: The list of API to choose from
parameters.defaultValue: 1.Email_API - This API is used to check email related information, 2.Security_API - This API is used to check security related information,3.User_API - This API is used to check user related information
